scripts.local: MONGO_URL_LOCAL=mongodb://localhost:27017 LOCAL_DEV=1 nodemon --exec npm run fastify-dev --watch src/ --watch ../data/ --watch ../shared/
scripts.fastify-dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect --max-old-space-size=512' NODE_ENV=development fastify start -T 120000 -l info -p 3333 src/app.js
scripts.prod: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' NODE_ENV=production fastify start -T 120000 -l info -a 0.0.0.0 src/app.js
